description:
Pica loses his temper and turns his full wrath against King Riku, whom he hopes to destroy, ending the revolution against Doflamingo. Meanwhile, Zoro, who has been distracted by Pica and drawn far from the battle, has to hatch a plan to save the king!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daichi Oudan: Kyozou Pica Kishuu Sakusen!
Die Erde bebt erneut – Picas großes Überraschungsmanöver!
La grande marche. La manœuvre surprise de Pica, la statue géante !
Moving Across the Ground! The Giant Statue Pica`s Surprise Maneuver!
Пересекая землю. Неожиданный ход гигантской статуи Пики
大地横断 巨像ピーカ奇襲作戦!
